measurements_data.source: Bulgaria, MOEW (Ministry of Environment and Water). 2014. National Waste Management Plan, 2014–2020 [Национален план за управление на отпадъците 2014–2020 Г.]. Ministry of Environment and Water (MOEW) [Министерство на околната среда и водите], Government of Bulgaria. Sofia, December.

Bulgaria, MOEW (Ministry of Environment and Water). 2014. National Waste Management Plan, 2014–2020 [Национален план за управление на отпадъците 2014–2020 Г.]. Ministry of Environment and Water (MOEW) [Министерство на околната среда и водите], Government of Bulgaria. Sofia, December.

Bulgaria, MOEW (Ministry of Environment and Water). 2014. National Waste Management Plan, 2014–2020 [Национален план за управление на отпадъците 2014–2020 Г.]. Ministry of Environment and Water (MOEW) [Министерство на околната среда и водите], Government of Bulgaria. Sofia, December.

Bulgaria, MOEW (Ministry of Environment and Water). 2014. National Waste Management Plan, 2014–2020 [Национален план за управление на отпадъците 2014–2020 Г.]. Ministry of Environment and Water (MOEW) [Министерство на околната среда и водите], Government of Bulgaria. Sofia, December.
measurements_data.comments: Calculated from National Plan data on waste composition for the five different types of settlements and population data from National Statistics for each of the five settlement types; paper/cardboard includes paper (8.03 percent and cardboard 6.15 percent); rubber/leather includes rubber (0.98 percent) and leather (0.98 percent) waste; other includes textile (2.88 percent), hazardous (0.6 percent) and inert (14.45 percent) waste
